title: More units of a resource decreases MP

content.question: Max Company produces electronic gadgets using labor and capital. If Max increases labor and decreases capital to produce the same quantity of gadgets, what will happen to the marginal product (MP) of labor and the MP of capital?

choices.label: MP of Labor MP of Capital Decrease Increase
MP of Labor MP of Capital Decrease No change
MP of Labor MP of Capital Increase Increase
MP of Labor MP of Capital Increase Decrease
MP of Labor MP of Capital No change Increase

content.answer: MP of Labor MP of Capital Decrease Increase
